typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		round_distance as double,
		avgAmount2 as double,
		avgTip2 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'deltataxi') ~> source1
source1 derive(tripType = iif(round_distance<20.0,'SHORT','LONG')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'deltataxi',
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['round_distance','avgAmount2','avgTip2'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
